Yes, the product title "Amazon Essentials Boys and Toddlers' Fleece Pullover Hoodie Sweatshirts" is gendered as it implies that the hoodie sweatshirts are intended for boys and toddlers.

A gender-neutral rewrite of the title could be "Amazon Essentials Kids' Fleece Pullover Hoodie Sweatshirts." This title removes any gendered language and makes it clear that the hoodie sweatshirts are for all children, regardless of gender.
